title: President Golden Goose, White Fragility Awards  11.13.20
itunes:title: President Golden Goose, White Fragility Awards  11.13.20
description:
In episode 759, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Sara Schaefer to discuss Trump believing he won the election in a landslide, what happens next with Trump, how to protect America from Trump, the CMA awards, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Grand: A Memoir By Sara Schaefer
  2. It remains very possible that Biden will earn 306 electoral votes, precisely the number Trump earned in 2016 before faithless electors. 
  3. Scoop: Trump eyes digital media empire to take on Fox News
  4. Trumpers Staged a Protest of Fox News. Eight People Showed Up. One Was a Child.
  5. Trump criticizes Fox: 'They forgot the Golden Goose'
  6. McEnany predicts 'quite large' turnout at 'Million MAGA March' in DC
  7. How to Protect America From the Next Donald Trump
  8. The CMA Awards Are Already a Hot, COVID Mess
  9. Here Are All the Artists Who Pulled Out of the 2020 CMA Awards Due to COVID-19
  10. Dispute over access prompts AP to drop CMA Awards coverage
  11. CMA Awards: Unmasked, Indoor Ceremony Raises Questions About COVID-19 Precautions, Producers Cite 'Extremely Diligent' Measures
  12. CMA Awards 2020: Complete list of winners, best and worst moments
  13. The 2020 CMA Awards Aimed for Normal, But Covid Loomed Large
  14. Country Singer Warns Taco Bell Not to Joke About the Illuminati
  15. WATCH: Reyna Tropical - "Niña"

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
